scenario.name: Outbound call scenario - Metaswitch CFS SIPREC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Content-Length: [len] Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, REGISTER, OPTIONS, PRACK, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, INFO, PUBLISH Require: siprec Contact: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port];+sip.src Allow-Events: message-summary, refer, dialog, line-seize, presence, call-info, as-feature-event, calling-name Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=metaswitch-boundary Expires: 180 P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Organization: Metaswitch Networks Supported: resource-priority, siprec, 100rel Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:123456789@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=- 3536141446 3536141446 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=ptime:20 a=label:1
--metaswitch-boundary Content-Disposition: recording-session Content-Type: application/rs-metadata
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <recording id="TA0oFOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==" xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:recording"> <datamode>complete</datamode> <session session_id="TA0oUOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <start-time>2017-01-24T23:17:38Z</start-time> </session> <participant participant_id="TA0qYuKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <nameID aor="[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]"> <name>[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]</name> </nameID> </participant> <participantsessionassoc participant_id="TA0qYuKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==" session_id="TA0oUOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <associate-time>2017-01-24T23:17:38Z</associate-time> </participantsessionassoc> <participantstreamassoc participant_id="TA0qYuKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <send>TA0ojOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==</send> <recv>TA0ojOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==</recv> </participantstreamassoc> <participant participant_id="TA0rKuKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <nameID aor="[field0 file="callee.csv"]"> <name>7[field0 file="callee.csv"]602922411</name> </nameID> </participant> <participantsessionassoc participant_id="TA0rKuKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==" session_id="TA0oUOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <associate-time>2017-01-24T23:17:38Z</associate-time> </participantsessionassoc> <participantstreamassoc participant_id="TA0rKuKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <send>TA0ojOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==</send> <recv>TA0ojOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==</recv> </participantstreamassoc> <stream id="TA0ojOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA==" session_id="TA0oUOKLEeanqeyezQV3BA=="> <label>1</label> </stream> <extensiondata> <metaswitchRecordingMetadata> <callType>originating</callType> <recordedParty>+1[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]</recordedParty> <businessGroup>[field2 file="tenant-users.csv"]</businessGroup> <userName>[field1 file="tenant-users.csv"]</userName> <systemName>[field3 file="tenant-users.csv"]</systemName> <callingPartyNumber>[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]</callingPartyNumber> <dialedDigits>1[field0 file="callee.csv"]</dialedDigits> </metaswitchRecordingMetadata> </extensiondata> </recording>
--metaswitch-boundary--

ACK sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Content-Length: 0 Contact: sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port];+sip.src Allow-Events: message-summary, refer, dialog, line-seize, presence, call-info, as-feature-event, calling-name Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Organization: Metaswitch Networks Max-Forwards: 70 To: <sip:123456789@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param]

BYE sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Content-Length: 0 Require: siprec Allow-Events: message-summary, refer, dialog, line-seize, presence, call-info, as-feature-event, calling-name Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Organization: Metaswitch Networks Max-Forwards: 70 Supported: resource-priority, siprec, 100rel To: <sip:123456789@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param]
